Class CalculatorArea

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
gui.CalculatorArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class CalculatorArea extends javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
The CalculatorArea class represents the main interface for calculating shipping costs.

  • Constructor Details

    • CalculatorArea

      public CalculatorArea()
      Constructor for the CalculatorArea class.

  • Method Details

    • setupLayout

      private void setupLayout()
      This function sets up the layout of the CalculatorArea.

    • setupEventHandlers

      private void setupEventHandlers()
      This function sets up the event handlers for the CalculatorArea.

    • handleCalculatorIO

      private void handleCalculatorIO()
      This function handles the input and output of the calculator. It reads the input values from the textFields converts them to the correct units and calculates the shipping costs.

    • readPacket

      private Packet readPacket()
      This function reads the input values from the textFields and converts them to the correct units.
      Returns:
      Packet with the converted values

    • convertToMillimeters

      private int convertToMillimeters(int value, String unit)
      This function converts the given value to millimeters.
      Parameters:
      value - that is to be converted
      unit - of the value
      Returns:
      value in millimeters

    • convertToGrams

      private int convertToGrams(int value, String unit)
      This function converts the given value to grams.
      Parameters:
      value - that is to be converted
      unit - of the value
      Returns:
      value in grams
